Hydras/Perceptor/kup:

"I want them OUT my territory, Prime"said Hydras coo=
ly "The last time the rodent was in my base, you two have done a lot troubl=
es, I just want to be sure that they dont do nothing this time... So, you s=
hould better comand them to leave my terriory without futher delay... Perce=
ptor, Scourge, cyclonus and Rodimus, Let's scort our Prisioners to their ro=
oms... And you little one"said thee Predacon boss to Nightlight"Wait here"
=

Perceptor started to hand cuff Kup's hand in his back and he attemped to d=
o the same with Tucson and Nightshift

From: Sandy 
Sent: Wednesday, April =
14, 2010 10:57 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
Subject: Re: BlackFortress


=
  
Tucson was good at blocking out negative comments. As Rodimus taunts him=
, he simply ignores him, not uttering one word about it for a moment or so,=
 and he also had Hydras breathing down his neck configuratively. Still he k=
eeps calm throughout, and first directs his attention to Rodimus.

"Failure=
? Hmm, Rodimus I don't know. To you it may seem like failure, to me, yes, i=
t was a mistake but also a learning experience. Learn not to go too fast, y=
et make decisions carefully. So, yes, I configuratively got a flat tire alo=
ng the way. But tires can be changed and after that, it's back on the road =
like nothing happened. Of course to you, it's like a perpetual road block. =
There, you have my answer. Nothing more."

He quietly follows orders by dis=
carding his weaponry. Having left his cross bow behind, he merely gives up =
an old sword and spear, as his weapons. He somehow felt that if he came wit=
h the bare minimal he wouldn't lose much.

Night Shift also discards his ri=
ffle without revolt. Yet he looks at Scorponok after hearing what Tucson Pr=
ime said and how he was viewing the situation.

" Okay, yeah, things went S=
outh. Big deal, happens all the time."

Tucson then looks to Cyclonus, yes,=
 he had looked as he had before he had lost his sight. It didn't surprise h=
im though. He had see and been through worse.

" I'm sorry Cyclonus, there =
are no secrets to share with you. I have not the answers for the power that=
 has been given to me, because I myself don't know them."

He lastly turns =
to Hydras. 

" Rat Trap and Quickstride pose no threat to you Hydras. They =
have not entered your base, and done nothing to get you angry. So to that q=
uestion, I have to say... LEAVE THEM OUT OF THIS. I am the one who made the=
 mistake, and it's me you want, not them. So, I'm here aren't I? You have m=
e and now you have nothing to fear from the outside world, because your mai=
n threat is now in your possession. Think about it, what can they do? They'=
re no threat to you at all."

Night Shift nodds in agreement to his command=
er's statement. Tucson looks to all his comrades before having to be separa=
ted from them.

"Kup, I did not intend to put your spark in danger, and for=
 that I am deeply sorry. Stay strong my friend, this isn't forever. And wha=
tever happens, happens. My heart goes out to Elita and one day, hopefully, =
she will never have to worry about anything ever again."

He puts a hand on=
 Night Shift's shoulder.

" Night Shift, we're going to be separated from e=
ach other. Again, this wouldn't be happening if I hadn't ran that red light=
. I promise you I will make it up to you but not sure as of how I will do i=
t just yet."

Night Shift nodds.

"Heey, it's cool, it's cool, we all mess =
up sometimes, like ya said. No worries boss bot, we'll get through this, li=
ke we always do. I'll be okay, I promise." 

They shake hands as they wait =
to be separated from each other.

Outside the fortress, Rat Trap senses som=
ething is a miss when it takes far too long for anyone to come out. Quickst=
ride looks down to him.

" Quickstride, it's been a really long time and no=
 word from Wheels or the others. Somethn's wrong."

Quickstride nodds.

"Ye=
ah, something really stinks around here doesn't it, and it's not me this ti=
me, because I haven't had any bean pods lately."

Rat Trap swallows hard.

=
" He told us ta wait out here. But he also told us that if he didn't come o=
ut right away, ta call for backup. Lord Elder, it's me, Rat Trap. Wheels ha=
sn't come out with the other guys yet, and it's been a very long time. Some=
thing's wrong. I think we need backup sir."

His voice falters a bit, as he=
 wipes off a tear with his rodent paw.

"Aww Wheels, why'dya have ta go'n d=
o that for? You're the only real friend I'll ever have."

Quickstride could=
 see what was happening. He puts his nose down to his rodent comrade.

" He=
y, he'll be okay, he probably ran inta a snag. He'll be fine, he's pretty b=
uff now Rat Trap. Don't worry, I bet he's got somethn' up his manifold. It'=
s just gonna take a while, that's all."

Rat Trap composes himself and scra=
mbles up onto Quickstride's back.

"We better find someplace ta hide."

Qui=
ckstride looks around and finds a bit of thick greenery near the black fort=
ress. He trots toward it, vanishing into the vegitation.

"This should be o=
kay for now. Well, until Hydras sends his goons out ta find us which is pro=
bably what'll happen.... Ooohh, bean pods..."

Again he thinks of nothing b=
ut food and begins to munch on the bean pods. Rat Trap looks onto the fortr=
ess hoping that Tucson Prime had a plan in place to get everyone out of the=
re in one piece.
